Action¶

class due.action.Action[source]¶

An Action is an Event in an Episode that allows the run of arbitrary Python code.

This is achieved extending this Action interface with the proper implementation of the run method.

static load(saved_action)[source]¶

Load an action from an object produced with due.action.Action.save()

Parameters:saved_action (dict) – the saved action
Returns:an Action object
Return type:due.action.Action
run()[source]¶

This method will be invoked when the Agent issues the Action in a conversation

save()[source]¶

Save the Action as a serializable object.

Returns:the serialized Action
Return type:dict
class due.action.ExampleAction[source]¶

An example action that creates a file in your home directory.

run()[source]¶

Runs the Action by creating a file named DUE_EXAMPLE_ACTION in your home directory.

class due.action.RecordedAction(data=None)[source]¶

Example action that just stores a boolean done variable which is set to True when the Action is run.

Parameters:data (dict) – data from another action (this is only used by load)
run()[source]¶

Runs the Action by setting self.done to True

save()[source]¶

See due.action.Action.save()
